# Run pipeline

```{r}
# Quarto file names of our pipeline
input_files <- c("01_load.qmd", "02_clean.qmd", "03_describe.qmd", "04_augment.qmd", "05_analysis_1.qmd", "06_analysis_2.qmd")
# HTML file names where we want to store our final results
output_files <- c("01_load.html", "02_clean.html", "03_describe.html", "04_augment.html", "05_analysis_1.html", "06_analysis_2.html")

# Loop through the files, run them and store them in the results folder in .html format
map(input_files, output_files, function(input_file, output_file) {
  quarto::quarto_render(
    input_file, 
    output_format = "html", 
    output_file = paste0("../results/", output_file)
  )
})
```

# Saving HTML
